body.en:
Hello [firstName],

Thank you for your ongoing participation in the PLAN-psoriasis feasibility trial.
We're asking everyone to take 3 photos of their skin for upload to our secure database every 3 months during the study.
We will use the photos to assess how active your psoriasis is, and to help develop accurate digital skin assessment methods.

If you would like to submit photos, please open the mySkin app and start the photos form. This is optional and does not affect your medical care or the rest of your participation in the study.

Thank you so much for your valuable contribution.

The PLAN-psoriasis team
Email: PLAN@kcl.ac.uk
